name: Down The Mountain We Go
description:
Are your prepared to explore the depths of the mountain? Three miles down the road from the Infinity Farmstead, lightning crashes into the mountain revealing a secret path. One hour later, you arrive at the rainy and charred scene. Four ancient carved pillars stand atop a darker than black maw leading further into the mountain.

Down The Mountain We Go

Twitter: @Infinity8Game
YouTube: @infinityentertainmentgaming
